# peopleInPhotoOperator

**Instance Property**

The operator that defines how to search for people in the photos.

## Declaration

```swift
var peopleInPhotoOperator: INConditionalOperator { get }
```

## Discussion

This property indicates whether the photo must contain all, some, or none of the people listed in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSearchForPhotosIntent/peopleInPhoto] property.

## Getting the People in the Photos

- **peopleInPhoto**: The people identified in the photos.
